programme.title: 花は咲く「花は咲く 東北に咲く」
programme.desc: どーもくんとチャロが不思議な少女といっしょに東北へ！東北の魅力がたくさん詰まったアニメ「花は咲く 東北に咲く」。歌と少女の声は高畑充希さん。.(n)

programme.title: 魂のタキ火「特別編 癒やしの炎」 ※一部地域は放送休止
programme.desc: 「主役は、炎とあなたです。」極上の炎と向き合い、心解きほぐす、穏やかなひとときを。.(n)

programme.title: ヨーロッパ トラムの旅「ドイツ ベルリン」 ※一部地域は放送休止
programme.desc: 欧州各地の都市を走る路面電車・トラム。車窓から見る美しいヨーロッパの街並み。街の名所旧跡も巡る1時間。今回は、ドイツ・ベルリンを旅する。.(n)

programme.title: 雪の魔法 ※一部地域は放送休止
ディープオーシャン「絶景 南極の海」[SS] ※一部地域は放送休止
programme.desc: 壮大な南極の絶景と生き物の世界を、極上の映像で描く。久石譲のオリジナル音楽とテロップのみで伝える、フィラー映像で最後の秘境「南極」を体感する。.(n)

programme.title: 大相撲（2021年） 幕内の全取組「春場所 初日」
明日へ1min． 僕に、私に、できること Vol．1「渡辺謙さん」
programme.desc: 被災地のために”できること”を伝えるシリーズ▽震災直後から人々に寄り添い耳を傾けてきた俳優・渡辺謙さん▽カフェを作ってできた“つながり”▽いま目指すものとは？.(n)

programme.title: キャラとおたまじゃくし島（9）「プリティな名前を言わないでぇ！ の巻」[字]
programme.desc: まっすぐで愛にあふれた少女戦士キャラが、不思議なガッキアニマルたちと出会い心を通わせる中で、音楽を奪われた島の謎を次々と解き明かす冒険ファンタジー第9話。.(n)

programme.title: Doki Doki！ NHKワールド JAPAN「アニメシリーズ始まる！」[字][再]
programme.desc: NHKワールドJAPANによるアニメシリーズ「Maiko−san Chi no Makanai−san」を取り上げ、見どころや魅力を伝える。.(n)

programme.title: 時論公論「経済・外交 視界不良か 習“一強”長期政権の行方」[再]
programme.desc: 長期政権を目指す中国の習近平指導部。今年の全人代・全国人民代表大会では、この先の視界が必ずしも良好ではないことを伺わせた。習政権が抱える課題について考える。.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本 新型コロナウイルス最新情報
programme.desc: ▼接待問題で参議院予算委員会で集中審議へ▼シリア内戦10年衝突続く▼徳島・授業に防災の視点▼群馬・タイガーマスク弁当▼熊本・世界2位のバトントワリング選手.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本 総務省の接待問題で参院予算委集中審議へ
programme.desc: ▼病床ひっ迫で老健の半数が受け入れ意向▼日銀・金融緩和策の“点検”公表へ▼アルコールをグラム表示▼おはBiz身につけるとわかります▼マニラ外出制限1年で経済悪化.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本 新型コロナ・入国規制に接種証明アプリ[字]
programme.desc: ▼接待問題で参院予算委集中審議へ▼がん治療後遺症の娘と母の卒業▼障害ある人もない人も楽しみながらコミュニケーション▼まちかど情報室「春の衣がえ 収納見直そう」.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース おはよう日本（関東甲信越）[字]
programme.desc: ▽原発事故で埼玉へ・地元の農業発展に功績 【キャスター】高瀬耕造，桑子真帆，【気象キャスター】檜山靖洋.(n)

programme.title: 【連続テレビ小説】おちょやん（71）「うちは幸せになんで」[解][字]
programme.desc: 万太郎一座との対決で結束が強くなった鶴亀家庭劇。一方、夫婦の時間を持てない千代（杉咲花）を心配するみつえ。その矢先、岡安にテルヲ（トータス松本）が姿を現す….(n)

programme.title: あさイチ「コロナ禍でどうなる 春の一大事！？PTA」[字]
programme.desc: 春。多くの学校でPTA役員を決める季節▽嫌々な人も一生懸命な人も、なせかモヤモヤ…どうして？▽時代に合ったあり方は？爆笑オリジナルミュージカルで考えるPTA問題.(n)

programme.title: うまいッ！「コラーゲンたっぷり！ふわふわ食感・ゲンゲ〜富山・魚津市〜」[字]
programme.desc: 海の幸が豊富な富山湾。地元でしか味わえない絶品の魚が、ゲンゲ。最大の特徴は、豊富なコラーゲン。唐揚げや吸い物などに大活躍。知る人ぞ知るゲンゲの魅力を紹介する。.(n)

programme.title: 新型コロナ 命を守る行動を「春ですが リバウンドに注意！」[字]
programme.desc: 花見や卒業旅行、歓送迎会など、人が集まる機会の多い春。新型コロナウイルスの感染の再拡大“リバウンド”を防ぐにはどうすればいいのか？身近な注意点をまとめてご紹介。.(n)

programme.title: 首都圏ネットワーク 都内の桜ことしも最早で開花[字]
programme.desc: ▼室内で楽しむ桜 ▼動画で楽しむ桜 注意点も… ▼都内感染者 175人前週より増加 ▼変異株60人確認の病院で対応は ▼障害者施設のクラスター ▼春場所2日目.(n)

programme.title: 首都圏ネットワーク（東京・神奈川・千葉・埼玉） パジャマで睡眠管理[字]
programme.desc: ▼パジャマ×ネット×AI＝睡眠管理？！ ▼この春卒業の高校生がコロナ禍で努力 ▼青天を衝け！渋沢栄一ゆかりの地を歩く「深谷編」.(n)

programme.title: NHKニュース7[二][字]
programme.desc: 夜7時、「一歩先へ、一歩深く」 今、このニュースを届けたい 【キャスター】瀧川剛史，【サブキャスター】上原光紀，黒田信哉，【気象キャスター】斉田季実治.(n)

programme.title: 鶴瓶の家族に乾杯「特別編 大竹しのぶと宮城スペシャル」[字]
programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年。これまでの旅の中から東北地方での名場面をえりすぐり、3週にわたってお届けする。3週目は「宮城スペシャル」。スタジオゲストは大竹しのぶ。.(n)

programme.title: 新型コロナ 命を守る行動を「春ですが リバウンドに注意！」[字]
programme.desc: 花見や卒業旅行、歓送迎会など、人が集まる機会の多い春。新型コロナウイルスの感染の再拡大“リバウンド”を防ぐにはどうすればいいのか？身近な注意点をまとめてご紹介。.(n)

programme.title: オシばん
programme.desc: 【キャスター】林田理沙.(n)

programme.title: 首都圏ニュース845[字]
programme.desc: これさえ見れば、きょう1日の首都圏のニュース、あすの気象情報がわかる。.(n)

programme.title: ニュースウオッチ9▽緊急宣言解除は今週判断へ・最新動向▽コンビニ店長の震災[二][字]
programme.desc: 宣言解除は今週判断へ1都3県の最新動向は▽コンビニ店長が見た東日本大震災10年▽私たちを忘れないで…シリア内戦10年.(n)

programme.title: 逆転人生「コロナ禍でほっこり！どん底スーパーのフルーツサンド」[解][字]
programme.desc: 大ブームの萌え断フルーツサンドにノンスタ井上・小嶋陽菜がびっくり！コロナ禍で大勢のお客さんを呼び寄せたのは、SNSの意外な力。家族経営の小さなスーパーの大逆転。.(n)

programme.title: 【ストーリーズ】ノーナレ 選「ちょっとだけ聞いて」[字]
programme.desc: ナレーションのないドキュメンタリー「ノーナレ」。駆け出しのころ「お花だから笑ってて」と言われた悔しさ。SHELLYが、世の中の不可思議な“刷り込み”にモノ申す！.(n)

programme.title: ニュースきょう一日[字]
programme.desc: きょう一日がわかる、おやすみ前の15分。仕事や家事で忙しかったあなたに。ポイントをわかりやすく。あしたにつながる、ささやかだけど役に立つ情報をまとめてお届け。.(n)

programme.title: 時論公論「来月から“70歳就業法” 生涯現役社会の働き方は？」[字]
programme.desc: 来月から、社員が70歳まで働けるよう全企業に努力義務が課される。65歳までは雇用の義務があるが、65歳を超えると委託など非雇用も可能。働き方や待遇はどう変わる？.(n)

programme.title: コワくない。就活 就活応援ニュースゼミ（2）[字]
programme.desc: どこを探しても答えが見つからない…そんな就活生のギモンを、就活のプロや人事担当者に直接ぶつけるシリーズ第2回！「コネ採用や早期採用など、別枠って存在する？」.(n)

programme.title: 有吉のお金発見 突撃！カネオくん▽定番のレジ横菓子！ひと粒チョコのお金の秘密[字][再]
programme.desc: ふだん聞けないお金の秘密をカネオくんが可視化で解明！時代をこえて愛される、ひと粒チョコ！ピンチを乗り越えた数々のアイデアと商品開発の裏側にももクロ百田も興奮！.(n)

programme.title: プロフェッショナル▽立ち止まるな、種はいつか実る〜野菜バイヤー・小堀夏佳〜[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 全国の農家から絶大な信頼を寄せられる野菜バイヤー。「安納芋」など大ヒットを連発。去年冬、挑んだ新種の野菜1トンの販売。しかし、産地に大雪が。そのとき下した決断！.(n)

programme.title: 世界はほしいモノにあふれてる「ベトナム縦断！美しき手仕事を探す旅」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 南から北へ、ベトナムの魅力を伝える縦断旅！繊細な手仕事に魅せられた人々に密着。世界中にファンを持つ「幻の陶器」、少数民族の貴重な品々も登場。注目の世界遺産も。.(n)

programme.title: スポーツ×ヒューマン「自由に 何にも縛られずに ブレイキン・半井重幸」[字]
programme.desc: その男は誰よりも“自由”。パリ五輪の新競技「ブレイキン」、半井重幸18歳。個性と個性のぶつけ合い。だからこそ負けるわけにはいかない。世界最高峰といわれる大会へ。.(n)

programme.title: チコちゃんに叱られる！チコっとだけスペシャル▽マイクを持たない手が動くのは？[字]
programme.desc: 素朴で身近な、でもなぜか考えたこともない疑問を5歳の女の子に投げかけられる「チコちゃんに叱られる！」。好評だった疑問を10分でお送りするスピンオフ番組です。.(n)

programme.desc: 大自然に生きる動物たちの24時間に密着した番組。今回の舞台は、しゃく熱の太陽が照りつけるアフリカの草原地帯・サバンナ。過酷な環境に適応した動物たちを紹介する。.(n)

programme.title: 知りたガールと学ボーイ「名前を聞きたい！」

programme.title: ボキャブライダー on TV「貫禄」

programme.title: ワンポイント手話「動物 植物」※字幕スーパー

programme.title: 旅するためのフランス語（22）「楽しかったって伝えたい！」

programme.desc: 東日本大震災から10年。非日常（もしも）と日常（いつも）の境目があいまいになりつつある今、2人の料理研究家が、「いつもともしもをつなぐレシピ」を提案します。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ 「基本をマスター おにぎり弁当」[字]
programme.desc: お弁当の定番、三角おにぎり。上手に作るのは意外に難しいものです。“おわん”を使うことで、ビギナーでも口の中で「ホロリ」とほぐれる理想のおにぎりを目指しましょう。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ 茶の湯 武者小路千家（2）「ステイホームで楽しむ（2）応用編」[解][字]
programme.desc: 武者小路千家の「茶の湯」を学ぶシリーズ。春の京都を舞台に茶の湯の世界を楽しむ。第2回はステイホームで楽しむ茶の湯の応用編。洋間でモダンに楽しむ方法を学ぶ.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン おうちでカフェ風 “映える”いちごレシピ5「おいしく保存」[字]
programme.desc: 旬を迎えたいちご。いちご菓子店店主でいちご研究家の渡部美佳さんに、バリエーション豊かな「いちごを味わい尽くレシピ」を教えてもらう。第5回はその保存と活用法.(n)

programme.title: にっぽんの芸能「幻の能“篁”復曲〜よみがえる執心の鬼〜」[字][再]
programme.desc: 第六回復曲試演の会から▽【曲目】1．古演出による能「葵上」▽シテ＝河村晴道ほか▽2．復曲能「篁（たかむら）」▽小野篁＝味方玄▽後鳥羽院＝片山九郎右衛門ほか.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「アップル パップル プリンセス」「切手のないおくりもの」
programme.desc: 「アップル パップル プリンセス」うた：竹内まりや／「切手のないおくりもの」うた：財津和夫.(n)

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース[手]
programme.desc: 【キャスター】工藤咲子.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTVシリーズ東日本大震災10年1▽逃げられなかった“要支援者”[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 東日本大震災で亡くなった人のうち、高齢者は半数を超え、障害者の死亡率は全住民平均の2倍だった。避難が困難な“要支援者”の命をどうすれば守れるのか。課題を探る。.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 子どもから大人まで！不眠の悩みに答えます「高齢者の睡眠障害」[解][字]
programme.desc: 今、新型コロナ感染の不安から不眠に悩む人が増えている。「寝つけない」「何度も目が覚める」など高齢者に多い睡眠障害の原因とその対策をタイプ別にお伝えする。.(n)

programme.title: 視点・論点「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」[字]
programme.desc: 「東日本大震災10年 サードセクターの社会的役割とは」菅野 拓（京都経済短期大学 講師）.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 科学と人間生活「光を求めている植物」[字]
programme.desc: 科学技術の発展は、どのようなところに生かされているのだろう？ 私たちの身の回りにある自然や道具を糸口に、科学の世界を楽しく解き明かしていく。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 総合的な探究の時間「あなたが身のまわりの環境を マッキー」[字]
programme.desc: 「総合的な探究の時間」とはいかなる学習か？を、番組独自の学習モデル、学習ノウハウと、現役高校生の探究学習の実践を通して学べるNHK高校講座です。.(n)

programme.title: NHK高校講座 日本史「下剋上の社会と戦国大名」[字]
programme.desc: 「歴カフェ」へようこそ！ここは歴史好きな人たちが集い各時代について語り合う茶屋です。日本はどんな歴史を歩んできたのか。日本史について知る楽しさを、さぁご一緒に！.(n)

programme.title: 日本の話芸 落語 桂文福「お笑い演芸教室」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 第412回NHK上方落語の会から桂文福さんの口演で落語「お笑い演芸教室」をお送りします（2021年2月4日（木）NHK大阪ホールで収録）。.(n)

programme.title: そして「みんなのうた」は生まれた〜60年を彩った名曲秘話▽おお牧場はみどりほか[字]
programme.desc: 60年前の発掘新資料で「みんなのうた」開始当時のエピソードが明らかに！出演：ペギー葉山（NHKアーカイブより）ほか。.(n)

programme.title: プチプチ・アニメ リヴ＆ベル「ベルくんのほそくてながいお友達」
programme.desc: リヴちゃんは大きな水玉リボンがトレードマークの女の子。ハリネズミのベルくんと行くさきには、いつも不思議な事がまっています。.(n)

programme.title: ピタゴラスイッチ「“すきま やくにたってます”のまき」[字]
programme.desc: 面白い考え方など“子どもにとっての「なるほど！」”を紹介。今回は「すきま やくにたってます」。身のまわりにある、役立つ「すきま」について紹介します。.(n)

programme.title: みんなのうた「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」「愛を着て」
programme.desc: 「ぐーぐーちょきちょき」うた：岡村靖幸／「愛を着て」うた：コレサワ.(n)

programme.title: いないいないばあっ！ 月曜日[字]

programme.title: おかあさんといっしょ 月曜日[字]

programme.title: パプリカ 世界とおどろう！（6）マダガスカル＆マーシャル諸島

programme.title: みいつけた！ 月曜日[字]

programme.title: にほんごであそぼ「福島のおきあがりこぼし」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 今日は、あいだのじいさんが「福島のいいところ」をご紹介します。野村萬斎「七転び…」、花鹿亭「時そば」より、名文／寿限無、春はあけぼの、うた「日本全国むかし歩き」.(n)

programme.title: えいごであそぼ with Orton「“sing”であそぼ」[デ]
programme.desc: アルファベットを読むときの「音」で遊び、楽しく英語に親しむ番組。オートンタウンを舞台に、実験、コント、歌、ダンス、アニメなど多彩なコーナーがいっぱいです！.(n)

programme.title: ミニアニメ おちゃめなシモン「しくじり君はだれ？」
programme.desc: シモンのせいで犬のエルヴィスがトマトの箱をなぎ倒してしまう。お詫びにシモンは収穫を手伝うがうまくもげず株ごと抜いてしまい「しくじり君」と揶揄（やゆ）されてしまう.(n)

programme.title: アニメ はなかっぱ「美男の実」「バラの女王と黒バラの騎士」[字][デ]
programme.desc: 頭の上に花が咲くかっぱ「はなかっぱ」と個性豊かな仲間たち、そして謎の花「わか蘭」を狙う黒羽屋蝶兵衛一味が、緑いっぱいの「やまびこ村」で、てんやわんやの大騒ぎ！.(n)

programme.title: ミミクリーズ「うごきのふしぎ むれ」[解][字]

programme.title: オトッペ「ヤングウエスティ （出会い）」

programme.title: アニメ わしも「ハチローの来世占い」[字]

programme.title: アニメ 忍たま乱太郎「抜天坊の破産の段」[字]
programme.desc: 乱太郎・きり丸・しんべヱは、忍術学園で学ぶ忍者のたまご「忍たま」。ユニークな先生や仲間たちと、明るく・たのしく・ゆかいな毎日がくり広げられる。.(n)

programme.title: 天才てれびくんhello， ▽電空物語いよいよ最終話！てれび戦士はいったい？

programme.title: わらたまドッカ〜ン「放課後ハートビートVSぼる塾」[字][再]
programme.desc: 男性2人組の放課後ハートビートと女性3人のぼる塾という共に初登場の期待の若手対決！今回も9人の子どもがVTRでネタを見て判定。ドッカ〜ンと笑わせるのはどっち？.(n)

programme.title: 沼にハマってきいてみた「ヴァンゆんも挑戦！SNSで話題の“スゴ技”バトル！」[字][双]

programme.title: 世界10代コロナ会議（3）※字幕スーパー
programme.desc: コロナ禍から1年。いま、世界の10代は、何に悩み、何を考えているのだろう。自撮りの動画を交換する対話のやりとりから、コロナ禍の10代たちの本音が語られる。.(n)

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 災害時に役立つ防災メニュー（1）▽食品の備蓄とアレンジレシピ[字]
programme.desc: 健康、食事、遊びなど、子育ての気になる情報やちょっとしたお役立ちアイデアをお送りする「まいにちスクスク」！魔法の5分で、あなたの子育てがもっと楽しくなりますよ！.(n)

programme.title: ハートネットTV「10年話せなかったこと」[字]
programme.desc: この10年話せなかったこと。10代で震災を経験した東北の若者と尾崎世界観が、「絆」「復興」という大きな言葉からこぼれ落ちる思いを、ともに探し、沈黙し、紡ぐ29分.(n)

programme.title: きょうの健康 病気のサイン！？味覚・嗅覚の異常「味が分からない」[解][字]
programme.desc: 食べ物の味がわからなくなる、味が薄く感じるなどの症状が現れる味覚障害。亜鉛不足やかぜ、うつ病などさまざまな原因の可能性がある。新型コロナウイルス感染のことも。.(n)

programme.title: NHK手話ニュース845[手]

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「しっとりおいしく そぼろ弁当」[字]

programme.desc: 武者小路千家の「茶の湯」を学ぶシリーズ。春の京都を舞台に茶の湯の世界を楽しむ。第3回は客作法と春ならではの旅箪笥と釣釜を用いた濃茶点前でのもてなしを学ぶ。.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン 不器用さんでも大丈夫！はじめてのミシン（1）「準備と試し縫い」[字]
programme.desc: コロナの巣ごもり需要でミシンが大ブーム。しかし、入手してみたが難しくて諦めてしまったという人が多いのでは。超初心者のためにミシンの基本を伝える。.(n)

programme.title: グレーテルのかまど「“舞妓さんちのまかないさん”のあずきばっと」[解][字]

programme.title: 100分de名著 100分de災害を考える（3）▽セネカ“生の短さについて”[解][字]
programme.desc: 平時において多くの人たちは「時」の真価を知らないまま生きている。困難の最中にあってこそ私たちは真の「時」とのつながりを取り戻すべきだというセネカの時間論に迫る。.(n)

programme.title: アニメ SHIROBAKO（22）「ノアは下着です。」[字]

programme.title: ねこのめ美じゅつかん「2歩め」[字]

programme.title: まいにちスクスク 親と子のメンタルケア（2）「幼児期前半（2〜3歳ころ）編」[字]

programme.title: きょうの料理 手仕事12か月「つくだ煮」[字]
programme.desc: 今月の手仕事は、江戸時代から続く保存食「つくだ煮」。日本料理店店主の林亮平さんが、応用のきく「つくだ煮の方程式」をもとに、春らしく家庭的なレシピを紹介します！.(n)

programme.title: きょうの料理ビギナーズ「しっとりおいしく そぼろ弁当」[字]
programme.desc: 新しい生活の準備を始める3月。ビギナーにピッタリのお弁当を提案します。定番のそぼろのつくり方をご紹介。ご飯やおかずの詰め方など、弁当作りの基本もお伝えします。.(n)

programme.title: 趣味どきっ！ シェフの休日（6）天野順子（スパイシーフード＆カレー店シェフ）[解][字]
programme.desc: 味でも見た目でも、私たちを魅了するプロの料理人たち。多忙な彼らの休日、自身や家族、仲間のために作る料理とは？そこにはどんな技が？人気シェフの暮らしのレシピ満載！.(n)

programme.title: まる得マガジン おうちでカフェ風 “映える”いちごレシピ6「いちごの生菓子」[字]
programme.desc: 旬を迎えたいちご。いちご菓子店店主でいちご研究家の渡部美佳さんに、バリエーション豊かな「いちごを味わい尽くレシピ」を教えてもらう。第6回はプリンなどの生菓子。.(n)

programme.title: 先人たちの底力 知恵泉「江藤新平 次の時代をデザインするには？」[解][字][再]
programme.desc: 近代日本の司法制度を形作った江藤新平。江戸幕府の政治制度を徹底的に研究し三権分立など明治新政府の新しい国家デザインを次々に発案。江藤の先進性に田原総一朗が迫る。.(n)

programme.title: ボキャブライダー on TV「貫禄」

programme.title: ハートネットTV 出張！ハートネット やさしいまちのレシピ「町田」[字]

programme.title: きょうの健康 病気のサイン！？味覚・嗅覚の異常「においが分からない」[解][字]

programme.desc: 声優・梶裕貴が実写連続ドラマ初主演。原田まりる著『ぴぷる』を原作とし、新しい愛(AI)のカタチを問う、SFヒューマンコメディ。.(n)

programme.title: あずみ
programme.desc: 上戸彩が本格主演を務めたアクション時代劇。最強の刺客となるべく育てられた少女あずみ。理も義もなくただ命令のまま、人を斬る自分の宿命に疑問を抱く彼女だったが……。.(n)

programme.title: あずみ２ Death or Love
programme.desc: 上戸彩が引き続いて主演し、暗殺者としての人生に苦しむヒロイン役を熱演。関ヶ原後の混乱期、最強の刺客として育てられた少女の苦闘を描いた痛快アクション時代劇の続編。.(n)

programme.title: ヌードの夜／愛は惜しみなく奪う
programme.desc: 自らの過去を消し去るために犯罪に手を染める少女と、彼女から奇妙な依頼を受けたことで壮絶なトラブルに巻き込まれる中年男の愛憎を描いたエロティック・ノワール。.(n)

programme.title: 30日の不倫
programme.desc: 週に一度の肉体だけの関係。何不自由なく暮らす女性が、妻子ある男性とのダブル不倫に陥っていくエロティック・ドラマ。裏切りの代償が迎える運命のクライマックスは！.(n)

programme.title: あずみ２ Death or Love
programme.desc: 上戸彩が引き続いて主演し、暗殺者としての人生に苦しむヒロイン役を熱演。関ヶ原後の混乱期、最強の刺客として育てられた少女の苦闘を描いた痛快アクション時代劇の続編。.(n)

programme.title: ヌードの夜／愛は惜しみなく奪う
programme.desc: 自らの過去を消し去るために犯罪に手を染める少女と、彼女から奇妙な依頼を受けたことで壮絶なトラブルに巻き込まれる中年男の愛憎を描いたエロティック・ノワール。.(n)

programme.title: 30日の不倫
programme.desc: 週に一度の肉体だけの関係。何不自由なく暮らす女性が、妻子ある男性とのダブル不倫に陥っていくエロティック・ドラマ。裏切りの代償が迎える運命のクライマックスは！.(n)

programme.title: 蜜のあわれ
programme.desc: 石井岳龍監督が二階堂ふみを主演に迎え、室生犀星の同名小説を映画化した異色の幻想譚。金魚から人間へと変貌した不思議な少女を、二階堂が小悪魔的な魅力たっぷりに熱演。.(n)

programme.title: 愛さずにはいられない
programme.desc: TV『フレンズ』のマシュー・ペリー、サルマ・ハエックという2大スター共演のロマンティックコメディ。ニューヨークのビジネスマンは、メキシコ人女性と結婚するが……。.(n)

programme.title: 美女と野獣（2014）
programme.desc: 父親の代わりに野獣の城に捕らわれの身となった美女。彼女は野獣の本当の心に触れ、彼を愛するように。ヴァンサン・カッセル＆レア・セドゥ共演でヒットしたファンタジー。.(n)

programme.title: ポイズン あるスキャンダルの秘密
programme.desc: 実力派俳優陣が共演したエロティックスリラー。米国進出が決まっていたベルギーの人気男優が突然、自殺してしまう。彼の妻は夫の死の真相を独自に探り出そうとするが……。.(n)

programme.title: ジャックと天空の巨人
programme.desc: 童話『ジャックと豆の木』が下敷き。天空の巨人族に捕まった王女を救おうと若者は冒険へ。監督は『ボヘミアン・ラプソディ』のブライアン・シンガー。.(n)

programme.title: ガンズ＆ゴールド
programme.desc: 『ビッグ・フィッシュ』のユアン・マクレガーが、頭脳明晰な強盗犯を演じたクライム・アクション。強盗犯、その弟子、ロシアン・マフィアが壮絶な心理バトルを繰り広げる。.(n)

programme.title: サンダーボルト（1974）
programme.desc: 『天国の門』のマイケル・チミノ監督の出世作となったクリント・イーストウッド主演のアクション。アメリカ中西部を舞台に、大金強奪を目論む男たちの姿をコミカルに描く。.(n)

programme.title: ライン・オブ・デューティ 汚職特捜班 #5（終）
programme.desc: 警察組織内部の腐敗と戦う汚職特捜班を描く、最上級の英国犯罪ドラマ。調査対象となった功績も人望もあるベテラン刑事と捜査官たちが熾烈な戦いを繰り広げる。.(n)

programme.title: ダンス・ウィズ・ウルブズ
programme.desc: ケヴィン・コスナー監督・主演で、アカデミー賞作品賞、監督賞など7部門に輝いた歴史ドラマ大作。南北戦争時代のアメリカ西部を舞台に、北軍中尉と先住民の交流を描く。.(n)

programme.title: ダンス・ウィズ・ウルブズ
programme.desc: ケヴィン・コスナー監督・主演で、アカデミー賞作品賞、監督賞など7部門に輝いた歴史ドラマ大作。南北戦争時代のアメリカ西部を舞台に、北軍中尉と先住民の交流を描く。.(n)

programme.title: ジャッカル [吹替版]
programme.desc: ブルース・ウィリスとリチャード・ギアの演技が光るサスペンス・アクション。伝説の暗殺者“ジャッカル”と彼を追う元IRAの暗殺者の壮絶な死闘。磯部勉よる吹替版を放送。.(n)

programme.title: ジャッカル [吹替版]
programme.desc: ブルース・ウィリスとリチャード・ギアの演技が光るサスペンス・アクション。伝説の暗殺者“ジャッカル”と彼を追う元IRAの暗殺者の壮絶な死闘。磯部勉よる吹替版を放送。.(n)

programme.title: 隣のヒットマン
programme.desc: ブルース・ウィリスが凄腕の殺し屋に扮した爆笑クライム・アクション。隣に伝説のヒットマンが引っ越してきたことから、平凡な歯医者がマフィアの陰謀に巻き込まれる。.(n)

programme.title: 隣のヒットマン
programme.desc: ブルース・ウィリスが凄腕の殺し屋に扮した爆笑クライム・アクション。隣に伝説のヒットマンが引っ越してきたことから、平凡な歯医者がマフィアの陰謀に巻き込まれる。.(n)

programme.title: 軽蔑（2011）
programme.desc: 芥川賞作家の中上健次原作を、子役時代から多くの映画やドラマなどで注目されていた鈴木杏と『蛇とピアス』などの高良健吾が、大胆で体当たりの演技で魅せる異色の愛憎劇。.(n)

programme.title: セットアップ
programme.desc: ブルース・ウィリス、カーティス・“50セント”・ジャクソンらが顔合わせした、ハードタッチのクライムアクション。裏社会でしか生きられない男たちの絆と裏切りを描く。.(n)

programme.title: 要塞
programme.desc: ナチス・ドイツに襲撃された村で生き残った少年たちが、アメリカ軍将校に率いられて復讐を果たす戦争アクション。監督は『サイレンサー／沈黙部隊』のフィル・カールソン。.(n)

programme.title: ザ・バッグマン 闇を運ぶ男
programme.desc: ジョン・キューザック＆ロバート・デ・ニーロが顔合わせしたクライムサスペンス。中身が不明のバッグを運ぶようボスから命じられた殺し屋。彼を待ち受ける危険な運命とは。.(n)

programme.title: プレデター
programme.desc: 謎のエイリアン“プレデター”とコマンド部隊との対決を描いたSFアクション。『ダイ・ハード』のジョン・マクティアナン監督、アーノルド・シュワルツェネッガー主演。.(n)

programme.title: プレデター２
programme.desc: アーノルド・シュワルツェネッガーが主演したSFアクションの続編。前作では中南米のジャングルで特殊部隊を襲った宇宙生物は、新たに米国のLAへ。.(n)

programme.title: プレデターズ
programme.desc: 宇宙最凶ハンターに進化した“スーパー・プレデター”の軍団は人類の戦闘のプロたちと死闘へ。ロバート・ロドリゲス監督らが製作したシリーズ第3作。.(n)

programme.title: オーバードライヴ（2013）
programme.desc: 『ワイルド・スピード』シリーズのドウェイン・ジョンソン主演のサスペンス・アクション。無実の罪で逮捕された息子の父親が、自ら麻薬組織に潜入して真相を追う姿を描く。.(n)

programme.title: ライン・オブ・デューティ 汚職特捜班 2 #1
programme.desc: 警察組織内部の腐敗と戦う汚職特捜班を描く、最上級の英国犯罪ドラマのシーズン2。今回の調査対象は、警察官を含む複数の死者が出た襲撃事件で唯一生き残った女性警部補。.(n)

programme.title: 軽蔑（2011）
programme.desc: 芥川賞作家の中上健次原作を、子役時代から多くの映画やドラマなどで注目されていた鈴木杏と『蛇とピアス』などの高良健吾が、大胆で体当たりの演技で魅せる異色の愛憎劇。.(n)

programme.title: X−メン
programme.desc: ヒュー・ジャックマンらの共演で人気アメコミを映画化。正義のミュータントチームは、地球の覇権を狙う悪のミュータント軍団と対決。後にシリーズ化。.(n)

programme.title: X−MEN２
programme.desc: ヒュー・ジャックマンらが共演したSFアクション大作の第2作。ミュータントと人類の全面戦争が勃発？“X-MEN”の面々は最悪の状況を迎える。.(n)

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: Three iconic islands. Contained ecosystems, cut off from the mainland. For their wildlife and human castaways, islands seem like sanctuaries. But there's a price to pay for living in paradise. Four in five of all global extinctions have happened on islands. In a rapidly changing world, they reflect the health of the planet. Islands explores the wildlife, history and culture of these unique habitats. This episode is about Madagascar, Earth's oldest island, cast away from Africa and India 80 million years ago. This land of plenty shows what strange forms life can take when it's left to experiment.(n)

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: Three iconic islands. Contained ecosystems, cut off from the mainland. For their wildlife and human castaways, islands seem like sanctuaries. But there's a price to pay for living in paradise. Four in five of all global extinctions have happened on islands. In a rapidly changing world, they reflect the health of the planet. Islands explores the wildlife, history and culture of these unique habitats. This episode is about Madagascar, Earth's oldest island, cast away from Africa and India 80 million years ago. programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Shezow

programme.title: Tashi

programme.title: Kuu-kuu Harajuku

programme.title: Move It Mobstyle

programme.title: What's For Dinner

programme.title: Back In Time For Dinner: Education Shorts
programme.desc: Step into a home in the 1960s! Students can take a look at what everyday life may have looked like for their grandparents.. Why is there only one phone for the whole house and why is it connected to the wall.(n)

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The democracy all Australians enjoy today began at the goldfields, but how? Ronan guides students through the events that led up to the Eureka Stockade at Bakery Hill in Ballarat.(n)

programme.title: My Place
programme.desc: Sarah, though still a child, works as a servant for the cold and demanding Mrs Owen. As if being bossed around by the lady of the house isn't bad enough, Sarah has to deal with Mrs Owen's sly and sickly daughter, Alice. Alice is as mean as her mother and twice as cunning. She sets out to make Sarah's life a misery, always trying to get her into trouble. But the two girls have more in common than they realise. They are both prisoners - Sarah to an impossible workload, Alice to a life-threatening illness. A truce of sorts, arising from a shared love of mischief, could lead to a lasting friendship between the two girls, but how much time do they really have.(n)

programme.title: Btn Specials
programme.desc: This special begins a look at what it was like on the First Fleet, how six separate British colonies formed the Australia we know today, what the Constitution is and why the Eureka Stockade was a turning point in history.(n)

programme.title: 199 Little Heroes

programme.title: Lest We Forget What Education Shorts

programme.title: Dates That Made History

programme.title: PowerPoint with Dr. Jack Graham
programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

programme.title: Restoration Road
programme.desc: Erin invites her siblings over for a sleepover to help ease the transition from a full house to living with only her new husband, Chad. Zach and Whitney get real about becoming parents and Michaella pays a surprise visit to her beau, Brandon, in Texas, with a chaperone in tow.(n)

programme.title: Ask Chris
programme.desc: A Kiwi-made show tackling the tough issues that many of us deal with, yet are afraid or unable to take to the counsellor's office ourselves. Ask Chris deals with a variety of topics such as communication breakdown, relationship problems, phobias and addictions, dealing with negative emotion in a constructive way and other issues from work-place bullying to the baby-blues. Chris Hight has 20 years experience as a counsellor, and 5 years experience as an online counsellor. Chris Hight pioneered web-based counselling in New Zealand, offering the very first online service in this country. Her website askchris.co.nz has grown to become a valuable resource in the New Zealand counselling sphere.(n)

programme.title: TV One Life
programme.desc: Young people listening to loud music, performing unusual stunts, and surprising members of the public in hidden camera situations may sound like something you might find on MTV. But, it's not. TV One Life is "Young people doing young people stuff," says Sean Park, Pastor of the Raleigh Charisma Church who produce the show. Each weekly episode focuses on a challenge, and aims to reach out to young people with the message of Jesus Christ and his love and salvation. The program shows that being a Christian is fun and that Jesus can fill your life with joy. It's not something boring or dull : it's cool and giving your life to Jesus is the best decision you could ever make.(n)

programme.title: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary
programme.desc: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is a reality TV series that documents the journey of Jeni and Sarah as they travel the USA from Michigan to Florida. They sample some great food, visit well known sites, and experience fun activities such as white water rafting and indoor skydiving. Most importantly, they meet a host of extraordinary women, young and old, and talk about identity, purpose, relationships, beauty, choices, and much more. Throughout their travels, Jeni and Sarah will have fun, but they will always bring each episode back to one central theme: teaching young ladies about God's grace in their lives and addressing relevant issues in a redemptive way. Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary is different than other youth-oriented reality TV for many reasons and will stand out as a positive, biblically-based alternative to many of the secular reality shows that depict today's youth in a negative light. It offers another option for reality TV fans that love the genre but are turned of.(n)

programme.title: Billy Graham Classics
programme.desc: The best-known Christian evangelist of the 20th century, Billy Graham gained world attention in 1949 with a tent revival in downtown Los Angeles that was scheduled for three weeks and lasted six. World renowned actors, singers, athletes and ministers share the platform with Dr. Graham. programme.title: Jeni: Seeking the Extraordinary

programme.title: Jesus: Son of God?
programme.desc: For centuries Christians have been declaring that Jesus is the Son of God. It's a bold statement - and one that bears questioning. When did all this begin? How could men and women, who believed in one God, think that God had a Son? What does 'Son of God' actually mean? Did Jesus himself have anything to say on the matter? Filmed in Turkey and the UK, Luke Waldock asks questions and presents answers to these searching questions. Jesus, Son of God? sets out on a journey to discover when, where and how this vital Christian belief originated.(n)

programme.title: Find Me
programme.desc: On what should be a day of celebration Senator McIntosh's son is kidnapped in an effort to end his opposition to a bill that would make it illegal to post any religious references in public or private. Now they must find the Senator's son, while battling the choices of their past or they will become the kidnapper's next victims.(n)

programme.title: Everytown Downunder
programme.desc: Everytown Downunder is the mission trip of a lifetime! Travelling through the Aussie outback to coastal towns and Australia's biggest cities, Everytown Downunder has everything you'd expect from a trip around Australia - the outback, crocodiles, unique Aussie characters, Sydney Harbour and more. The series follows Australia's most travelled music evangelist, Steve Grace and his 28 person team on a 25,000km road trip performing 78 evangelical concerts, sharing their faith journeys and experiencing everything Australia has to offer. Along the way, they camp under the outback stars, swim with crocodiles at the top end, learn how to make an Aussie meat pie, and fulfil many life long dreams.(n)

programme.desc: PowerPoint Ministries started as a vision of Dr Jack Graham and his wife, Deb, 20 years ago. They believed that the power of God was evident in their growing church and that His Gospel message should be spread beyond the walls of that church to the world at large. They put their faith into action and purchased airtime on the Trinity Broadcasting Network. PowerPoint Ministries was then officially launched in April 1994. Over the past 19 years, PowerPoint Ministries has grown to an expansive network of local, national, and international television and radio broadcasts. In fact, PowerPoint can be seen or heard by a potential audience of millions of television viewers and radio listeners across the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, South Africa, Iran, Russia, Israel and more. The Ministry has a vision to glorify God by introducing Jesus Christ as Lord to as many people as possible and to develop them in Christian living using the most effective means to impact the world, making an eternal difference in this generation.(n)

Now under the leadership of Bobby Schuller, Dr Schuller's grandson. The congregation worships at Shepherd's Grove Church in Garden Grove, CA. The program aims to provide spiritual principles and practices that can help people, as they become happy students of Jesus and live a life of meaning. To learn more about who they are in Christ through the process of formation, to belong to his family of believers and become a part of the community and to heal as they are loved and then love and help heal others through mission. Jesus Christ ushered in the Kingdom of God into our world through His death and resurrection. He invites everyone to be a part of this amazing movement by trusting and following Him. programme.title: Michael Mosley: A History Of Surgery
programme.desc: Looks at plastic surgery discovering it is not a modern phenomenon. It started over 400 years ago with a spate of botched nose jobs, so badly engineered that the nose would fall off if the wind blew too hard. It marked the birth of a whole new obsession - surgeons gradually became entranced with the idea that not only could they fix the body, but now they could even fix our sense of self-esteem.(n)

programme.title: Paris-nice
programme.desc: Live coverage of the 2021 Paris-Nice stages. International Cycling 2021. Live to AEDT only.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from the East Coast to the South Coast beginning today in the port of Ipswich, capital of the farming county of Suffolk. His first port of call is an agricultural implement works with its own railway sidings. Michael investigates what could have earned the Victorian manufacturer a special mention in his Bradshaw's. Continuing his journey south west into Essex Michael dredges oysters off Mersea Island before taking the train to Witham, where he discovers a model farming establishment at Tiptree. His final destination today is Chelmsford and the world's first purpose-built radio equipment factory, established by Guglielmo Marconi.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Steered by his Bradshaw's, Michael Portillo heads along the Essex bank of the Thames before crossing the river into the Garden of England, Kent. He begins today's leg at Barkingside, where a Victorian philanthropist called Dr Thomas Barnardo made it his life's work to transform the lives of destitute children. From Upminster Michael takes the London, Tilbury and Southend Railway to Tilbury and finds out how the line and the old station transformed the town into one of the country's most important ports. At the docks, Michael tries his hand at loading a container on to a pocket wagon. Over the river at Gravesend Michael discovers how one of Queen Victoria's favourite army officers, General Gordon, left his mark on the town. Michael's last destination on today's leg is Rochester, where he encounters a host of familiar characters and explores the city which was home to one of the Victorian era's greatest writers, Charles Dickens.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey from Norwich to Chichester beginning today in Faversham in Kent, at one of the country's oldest surviving breweries, Shepherd Neame. Michael discovers how the brewery invested heavily in the railways and even ran rolling stock with its own smart livery taking beer to London. After making his own delivery to the Railway Tavern in one of the brewery's oldest vehicles, Michael heads for the south coast to the defensive town of Dover, little more than 25 miles from the historic enemy, the French. Here he uncovers one of Dover's best kept secrets, the sunken fortress known as the Western Heights. In the Weald of Kent, Michael finds out how the railways helped to put Tonbridge School on track for cricketing glory before heading into Surrey where he blow-dries a hen in Dorking.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth I And Her Enemies

programme.title: Berlin Station
programme.desc: Mere hours remain before enemy forces topple the Estonian government. Without Langley's backing, Berlin Station acts alone in one final desperate push to prevent the fall of a nation.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: On the final leg of his journey between the cathedral cities of Norwich and Chichester, Michael Portillo discovers the history behind the extraordinary Pavilion at Brighton and learns that Queen Victoria was not an admirer of the Prince Regent's flamboyant taste. Michael finds that while above ground the railways brought day trippers to frolic in fashionable Brighton, underground, Victorian engineers built a magnificent network of sewers more than 40 miles in length, which are still functioning today. At Bramber, he discovers at the time of his guide tourists flocked to the town in huge numbers due to a Victorian museum of taxidermy. Michael's next stop is the impressive castle at Arundel and he's pleased to find that the Duke of Norfolk was a great supporter of the railways. His rail journey ends in Chichester from where he heads up into the South Downs for a taste of life in the fast lane at Goodwood.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo experiences Victorian entertainment in one of Wales's best-loved resorts, hears how the railways took Welsh textiles into even the most exclusive households and unleashes the power of a 19th century engineering triumph.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth I And Her Enemies
programme.desc: Elizabeth became queen at the age of 25, but her reign was far from safe. As a high-profile Protestant monarch surrounded by Catholics in Europe, Elizabeth was pressured to marry and produce a Protestant heir, drawing the ire of her Catholic cousin, Mary, Queen of Scots.(n)

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are Aus
programme.desc: Renowned neurosurgeon Charlie Teo's journey will take him to Malacca, where he discovers a culture he's never heard of, but one with which he can now clearly identify.(n)

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael embarks on a stunning rail journey from the Thar Desert in Rajasthan to the Indian capital, taking in desert landscapes and dazzling historic palaces. From Jodhpur, Michael strikes out into the desert, taking a camel ride to a village where life has changed little in centuries, before embarking on the Jaipur-Agra-Delhi aGolden Triangle' tour - India's must-do itinerary in 1913 as today.(n)

programme.title: Jeopardy

programme.title: SBS World News
programme.desc: Up-to-date reports and analysis of the major national and international news stories of the day in Australia's only world news service.(n)

programme.title: Great Australian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Armed with his 1913 Bradshaw's Guide, Michael Portillo crosses the south east of Australia from the seat of government in Canberra, to the multi-ethnic heart of its second largest city Melbourne. Floating above Canberra in a hot air balloon, Michael sees how Australia's Bush Capital was planned in the early 20th century.(n)

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: In Kumi Taguchi's first episode as host, we ask the question: what's it like to get to your fifties and find out you've got ADHD? A range of adults from their twenties to fifties share what it was like to get that diagnosis, how things about their past fell into place and how they used the diagnosis to change their lives for the better. They are joined by family who share the impact on them.(n)

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: This is a story no parent can afford to miss. During global COVID-19 lockdowns, police reported a huge increase in the number of people viewing and sharing child sexual abuse images online. In the 1990s, there were 10,000 such images - now there are more than 47 million. Evan Williams reports from the UK where the government has pledged to become the safest place in the world for kids to use the internet. He meets the police officers, counsellors and investigators trying to stop the proliferation of abuse material, and he meets victims and perpetrators who bravely share their stories.(n)

programme.title: The Feed
programme.desc: Join Marc Fennell, Patrick Abboud, Jeannette Francis and Andy Park as they as they combine news of the day, topical commentary, pop culture and in-depth features, adding a fresh perspective on the latest local and international headlines.(n)

programme.desc: Up-to-date reports and analysis of the major national and international news stories of the day in Australia's only world news service. (An SBS Production).(n)

programme.title: The Pier
programme.desc: The relationship between Alejandra and Conrado continues and intensifies. Veronica, however, is not happy at all, and wants Alejandra to choose between her and Conrado, to avoid future suffering.(n)

programme.title: Borgen
programme.desc: Birgitte's government prepares to present a new welfare reform package called A Common Future, which is being polished at a political seminar. But there is unrest in the Labour Party when their leader Bjorn Marrot comes under personal attack in the media. Birgitte senses a rebellion brewing. Meanwhile, the pressure grows on the home front when Phillip announces he has a new girlfriend. Katrine covers the political seminar for Express, whose editor, Laugesen, has his own agenda.(n)

programme.title: Borgen
programme.desc: When pirates hijack a Danish ship off the coast of Somalia, Birgitte's coalition partner Hoxenhaven diverts attention from her when she so badly needs a success story. When compromising photos of Hoxenhaven turn up at the Express, the newspaper's editor Laugesen wants to use them against Hoxenhaven, but Katrine is sceptical. Brigitte's private life hangs in tatters and she makes a mistake that threatens her career.(n)

programme.title: Borgen
programme.desc: Birgitte Nyborg's government is about to negotiate the environmental element of the new reform package called A Common Future. Birgitte wants a multi-party agreement, but must face the reality of parties who cannot and will not compromise. Kasper convinces her that underhand tactics can help win her a majority for the reform, but this has grave consequences for the party. Katrine receives an unusual job offer which puts her personal beliefs to the test. At home, Birgitte's children are clearly affected by their mother's work-related stress; Laura in particular struggles with her absence.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo feeds the crew of Britain's newest battleship, discovers how the Victorians planned to repel a possible French invasion and learns that there's a well established industry where one might least expect to find it.(n)

programme.title: Celebrate St Patrick Concert 2020
programme.desc: Church choirs, traditional Irish music and emotive poetry: tune into this incredible performance celebrating St Patrick's legacy.(n)

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo explores one of the greatest locomotive factories in railway history, discovers the dark side of the industrial revolution and learns how, in Victorian times, the potteries brought their products to the masses.(n)

programme.title: Tony Robinson: Britain's Ancient Tracks
programme.desc: Tony walks Offa's Dyke in the footsteps of William Wordsworth, encounters Wales' fearsome dragon, and ponders the priceless gold coin issued by King Offa in praise of Allah.(n)

programme.title: Australia In Colour
programme.desc: Sport and the arts are imported from Britain and are already embedded in society at Federation in 1901. Fuelled by sunshine and leisure time, homegrown heroes emerge, including Phar Lap, the Australian cricket team, surf lifesavers, Dame Nellie Melba, and the hit films that perpetuate and reflect Australia's character.(n)

programme.title: Departure
programme.desc: The search for the Flight 716 wreckage continues as the TSIB team learn more about Captain Donovan's secret life. Kendra wonders if the plane's lone survivor is more than the innocent victim she appears to be.(n)

programme.title: Sbs World News Late
programme.desc: Up-to-date reports and analysis of the major national and international news stories of the day in Australia's only world news service. (An SBS Production).(n)

programme.title: Romulus
programme.desc: Latium, 8th century BC. The Thirty Villages of the Latin League live peacefully under the leadership of Numitor, King of Alba Longa. Forced into exile by a prophecy, his throne goes to the twins Enitos and Iemos. But Numitor's ambitious brother, Amulius, has other plans that will change the boys' fate. Amulius' young daughter Ilia, a Vestal virgin, hides a secret. Meanwhile, in Velia a group of young men take off for the woods for a rite of initiation. Among them is the slave Wiros.(n)

programme.title: Romulus
programme.desc: The Ruminales take Wiros and Iemos to the cave to meet the She-Wolf. Injured while trying to escape, Iemos initially doesn't trust the Ruminales but soon changes his mind.(n)

programme.title: Aloys
programme.desc: A lonely private investigator is contacted by a mysterious woman who pulls him into a mind game known as 'telephone walking'. Fascinated by her voice, Aloys discovers an imaginary universe that allows him to break out of his isolation.(n)

programme.title: Capharnaum
programme.desc: After running away from his negligent parents, committing a violent crime, and being sentenced to five years in jail, a hardened 12-year-old Lebanese boy sues his parents for giving him life.(n)

programme.title: Belle And Sebastian 3
programme.desc: Sebastian tries to protect his beloved dog Belle from her previous owner.(n)

programme.title: The Red Turtle
programme.desc: Gorgeously animated, this wordless story about a stranded castaway pays tribute to what's most important in life: companionship, love, family, and the stewardship of nature.(n)

programme.title: From Up on Poppy Hill
programme.desc: Set in Yokohama in 1963, this lovingly hand-drawn film centers on Umi (voiced by Sarah Bolger) and Shun (voiced by Anton Yelchin) and the budding romance that develops as they join forces to save their high school's ramshackle clubhouse from demolition. The top-grossing Japanese film of 2011 and winner of the Japan Academy Prize for Animation, From Up on Poppy Hill captures the innocence of new love as well as the beauty of Yokohama's harbor and lush surroundings.(n)

programme.title: Roald Dahl's Esio Trot
programme.desc: Esio Trot is a story about shy Mr Hoppy and his secret love for his neighbour, Mrs Silver, who he chats to over the balcony. This was one of Roald Dahl's last stories.(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: An epic adventure set in the last Ice Age, 20,000 years ago. While on his first hunt, an initiation to his tribe's most elite group, a young man is injured and left for dead after a bison hunt goes horribly wrong. Awaking to find himself broken, alone, and miles from his village - he must learn to survive and navigate the harsh and unforgiving wilderness. Reluctantly taming a lone wolf abandoned by its pack, the pair learn to rely on each other to hunt and become unlikely allies, enduring countless dangers and overwhelming odds in order to find their way home before the deadly winter arrives.(n)

programme.title: The Ash Lad
programme.desc: Espen, 'Ash Lad', a poor farmer's son, embarks on a dangerous quest with his brothers to save a princess from a vile troll known as the Mountain King.(n)

programme.title: The Circle
programme.desc: A young tech worker takes a job at a powerful internet corporation. She soon comes to learn that her decisions and actions will determine the future of humanity.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbirds
programme.desc: Having narrowly averted a major disaster on an oil rig, the Thunderbirds have just returned home to their secret base when TB5, their space based station, is critically damaged in a suspected meteor strike. Unbeknown to them, the attack on TB5 is a deliberate ploy by international master criminal Aristotle Spode to get them off the island. He takes over the island and forces Brains into submission, using the power of his mind. But Spode has overlooked one key factor: Alan, Fermat and Tin Tin are still on the island.(n)

programme.title: Tom Thumb
programme.desc: The adventures of a boy the size of a thumb, who is taken in by a kindly couple.(n)

programme.title: Mermaid
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Four-year-old Desi learns to accept the death of her father by sending him a letter on a balloon to which she receives a reply. Stars Ellen Burstyn.(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Emily Watson, Brian Cox. Released from prison for IRA activities, a one-time boxer tries to reclaim his life, but the militants have other ideas in this drama starring Daniel Day-Lewis.(n)

programme.title: Capharnaum
programme.desc: After running away from his negligent parents, committing a violent crime, and being sentenced to five years in jail, a hardened 12-year-old Lebanese boy sues his parents for giving him life.(n)

programme.title: Thick Lashes Of Lauri Mantyvaara
programme.desc: Best friends Satu and Heidi preach that real love is not for sale as they go around sabotaging posh weddings in the Finnish archipelago. But when Heidi falls head over heels in love with the ice hockey rising star Lauri Mantyvaara, Satu is left alone with their plans. Love, friendship and revolution are put to the final test as Satu is forced to decide what she really wants. And whether she dares to go for it.(n)

programme.desc: Calvary's father James is a good priest who is faced with sinister and troubling circumstances brought about by a mysterious member of his parish. programme.desc: When a child is killed in a hit and run accident, his small community is in a state of shock. As the hunt for the child's killer continues, tension in the town rises, gossip reigns, and the boy's death becomes a catalyst, or an excuse for settling old scores or renewing long buried resentments. Directed by Fien Troch, and stars Ina Geerts and Johanna ter Steege.(n)

programme.title: The Bookshop
programme.desc: Set in a small town in 1959 England, a woman decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop, a decision which becomes a political minefield.(n)

programme.title: Lassie
programme.desc: The world's favourite Collie joins an embattled city family on their way to a fresh start in the country and proves to be their saviour.(n)

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: A hardened young murderess faces execution for her crimes but is offered a reprieve if she joins an organization of high-level assassins.(n)

programme.title: Song of Granite
programme.desc: The life story of traditional sean-nos singer Joe Heaney, from County Galway, Ireland. This film revolves around the life of the great traditional Irish singer, Joe Heaney. The harsh landscape combined with the myths, fables and songs of his Connemara childhood helped shape this complex and fascinating character. Enigmatic and complex, Heaney's devotion to his art came at a huge personal cost. By the time of his death in Seattle in May 1984, he was widely recognised as one of the most important figures in Irish traditional music, having won fans and admirers from every part of the globe and, most particularly, from the folk music scene in the United States.(n)

programme.title: The Shadow of Violence
programme.desc: Douglas 'Arm' Armstrong has become the feared enforcer for the drug-dealing Devers family, while also trying to be a good father. Torn between these two families, Arm's loyalties are tested when he is asked to kill for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Further Adventures, The. Holmes and Watson's new careers as consultants for Scotland Yard in London take them inside the tabloid journalism industry when a model is the victim of an acid attack.(n)

programme.title: In Search Of Umami
programme.desc: The Maillard reaction is the science describing the heat that forces interplay between proteins and sugars translating into colour, aroma, and flavour in Kuala Lumpur's claypot rice, char siu, and roti canai.(n)

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy takes a trip on the floating markets of Thailand, gathers barnacles on the deadly cliffs of Portugal, and throws a drool-worthy feast in Melbourne.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Laotian cuisine is packed with bold, balanced flavours. Reflective of surrounding countries such as Vietnam and Thailand, Laotian food also shares a balance of spicy, sour and sweet flavours, however, it is relatively unknown to many Australians. Diana shares Laotian recipes including sticky rice - a staple ingredient in Laotian cooking used to prepare one of her favourite street food snacks - khao jee. She explores popular flavours in Laos in a spicy pork sausage - sai oua - packed with vibrant herbs and spices. Diana is also joined in the kitchen by chef Jerry Mai who prepares salt crust grilled fish - a whole snapper filled with aromatics that celebrates Laos's fresh and vibrant flavours.(n)

programme.title: Wok Vs Pot With Marion And Silvia
programme.sub-title: Wok X Pot With Marion And Silvia Series 1 Ep 3
programme.desc: When it comes to traditional Italian and Thai food, you can't go past a classic bolognese and pad Thai. And what about everyone's favourite desserts - magical deep fried ice-cream and Italy's iconic tiramisu? Marion and Silivia share their recipes for their favourite traditional recipes.(n)

programme.title: Michela's Tuscan Kitchen
programme.desc: Michela explores the butchers, markets, and restaurants of Tuscany, where she discovers delectable local produce. Along with sister Emi, Michela serves pork with mango and peperoncino, then turns her attention to an easy cheats version of mushroom risotto made with porcini mushrooms, followed by a simple dessert of fresh roasted peaches and orange syrup.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Far Eastern Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick Stein visits Sri Lanka, where he discovers a wealth of hot and spicy vegetable curries. In Colombo, he meets Chef Publis, one the country's most respected chefs, and tastes an unforgettable chilli crab in a small Tamil eatery. Down in Galle, Rick discovers the delights of tea plantations and buffalo curd, and experiences first-hand the secrets of making cinnamon. Back at home, he creates a delicious cashew nut curry to savour the memories of his time in Sri Lanka. He then moves on, to the volcanic island of Bali, where food takes on a religious significance. Rick samples the best roast pork he has ever tasted. After buying fish straight off the day boats, he enjoys fresh barbecued fish on a beach. He ends his trip to Bali by taking part in a village ceremonial feast.(n)

programme.title: Top Of The Shop With Tom Kerridge
programme.desc: In this fourth heat, four food producers with fledgling sauce businesses come to test out their products on the locals in Malhamdale, in the heart of the Yorkshire Dales. They have two days in the shop to promote and sell their wares.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co. Bitesize
programme.desc: Poh & Co. invites you into the always delicious world of acclaimed cook, artist and lover of life - Poh Ling Yeow.(n)

programme.title: Gino's Italian Escape
programme.desc: Gino says arrivederci to Sardinia and arrives in the capital city of Sicily - Palermo. Sicily is somewhere Gino has never visited, so this is a real journey of discovery for him. Home of the mafia, a vibrant street food culture and rich history, this portside city stops Gino in his tracks. He has an unexpected encounter at the street food market, meets the man who stood up to the mafia, and ends up wine tasting in Marsala, finishing up his day in the vineyard cooking a beautiful chicken in marsala sauce.(n)

programme.title: Gok Cooks Chinese
programme.desc: Gok makes steamed lemon sole, Peking duck with pancakes and stewed aromatic aubergine.(n)

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: Three new pairs of cooks compete for a place in the final - Different Fravas, SassyFoodie, and Jum Jo Ji. Who will make the most profit when the 50 diners arrive.(n)

programme.title: Cooking Up A Fortune
programme.desc: It's the last day of the heat and one kitchen will win a place in the weekly final. Cooking today are Different Fravas, SassyFoodie, and Jum Jo Ji.(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Baking With Juliet Sear
programme.desc: Juliet prepares some special bakes for Christmas, including baked party canapes, a brussels sprouts tarte tatin, and a spectacular chocolate orange profiteroles tower. Liam Charles pays a visit to serve up Christmas Lunch on a sheet of ruff puff pastry, and Juliet visits chef Chantelle Nicholson in her London restaurant to sample a vegan main course Christmas meal.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Down Under Bitesize
programme.desc: Some of your favourite moments and recipes from Adam Liaw's culinary and cultural journey through Australia and New Zealand. (Commissioned by SBS) (Short) (Rpt) G.(n)

programme.title: Late Nite Eats
programme.desc: Jordan explores the Montreal scene and it doesn't disappoint. First, he heads to Notre Dame de Grace to try the late night discount menu at Monkland Tavern. Jordan falls in love with the braised calamari caponata, but his mind is blown by the many flavours in the soft shell crab banh mi. Next up, it's off to Moishe's, one of Montreal's oldest steak restaurants in Plateau Mont Royal. This 70 year old establishment is dishing out something new with its late night menu, and Jordan gets started with a superlative filet mignon poutine thats wowing the younger late night crowd.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Bread
programme.desc: Malta is known for its sun, sea, and simple way of life. Join Andrew Connole as he finds the best bakers and experiences the very best of local Maltese food.(n)

programme.title: In Search Of Umami
programme.desc: The Maillard reaction is the science describing the heat that forces interplay between proteins and sugars translating into colour, aroma, and flavour in Kuala Lumpur's claypot rice, char siu, and roti canai.(n)

programme.title: Sourced
programme.desc: Guy takes a trip on the floating markets of Thailand, gathers barnacles on the deadly cliffs of Portugal, and throws a drool-worthy feast in Melbourne.(n)

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan
programme.desc: Laotian cuisine is packed with bold, balanced flavours. Reflective of surrounding countries such as Vietnam and Thailand, Laotian food also shares a balance of spicy, sour and sweet flavours, however, it is relatively unknown to many Australians. Diana shares Laotian recipes including sticky rice - a staple ingredient in Laotian cooking used to prepare one of her favourite street food snacks - khao jee. She explores popular flavours in Laos in a spicy pork sausage - sai oua - packed with vibrant herbs and spices. Diana is also joined in the kitchen by chef Jerry Mai who prepares salt crust grilled fish - a whole snapper filled with aromatics that celebrates Laos's fresh and vibrant flavours.(n)

programme.title: Wok Vs Pot With Marion And Silvia
programme.sub-title: Wok X Pot With Marion And Silvia Series 1 Ep 3
programme.desc: When it comes to traditional Italian and Thai food, you can't go past a classic bolognese and pad Thai. And what about everyone's favourite desserts - magical deep fried ice-cream and Italy's iconic tiramisu? Marion and Silivia share their recipes for their favourite traditional recipes.(n)

programme.title: Michela's Tuscan Kitchen
programme.desc: Michela explores the butchers, markets, and restaurants of Tuscany, where she discovers delectable local produce. Along with sister Emi, Michela serves pork with mango and peperoncino, then turns her attention to an easy cheats version of mushroom risotto made with porcini mushrooms, followed by a simple dessert of fresh roasted peaches and orange syrup.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Far Eastern Odyssey
programme.desc: Rick Stein visits Sri Lanka, where he discovers a wealth of hot and spicy vegetable curries. In Colombo, he meets Chef Publis, one the country's most respected chefs, and tastes an unforgettable chilli crab in a small Tamil eatery. Down in Galle, Rick discovers the delights of tea plantations and buffalo curd, and experiences first-hand the secrets of making cinnamon. Back at home, he creates a delicious cashew nut curry to savour the memories of his time in Sri Lanka. He then moves on, to the volcanic island of Bali, where food takes on a religious significance. Rick samples the best roast pork he has ever tasted. After buying fish straight off the day boats, he enjoys fresh barbecued fish on a beach. He ends his trip to Bali by taking part in a village ceremonial feast.(n)

programme.title: Top Of The Shop With Tom Kerridge
programme.desc: In this fourth heat, four food producers with fledgling sauce businesses come to test out their products on the locals in Malhamdale, in the heart of the Yorkshire Dales. They have two days in the shop to promote and sell their wares.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: Donal visits Mary O'Rourke who taught English before she became a politician. She used Theodora's columns in the Irish Times as a teaching aid, believing that the stories and use of language would improve her own students' English. She talks about this to Donal, reads a couple of extracts from the paper, and discusses the food she ate growing up in Athlone.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt and Michael cook a one-pan wonder - a delicious Jambalaya, while Courtney cooks a great meat-free-Monday dish with her egg and tomato curry.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to Ligoria - a region all about flowers, herbs, and lot's of vegetables. With the help of her granddaughter Julia, Lidia creates a soup filled with lots of fresh vegetables. Then, Lidia's grandson Lorenzo, helps to make a pasta with string beans and potato in a fresh pesto sauce. And to finish off the meal, Lidia and Lorenzo make a delicious cherry tart.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: In this episode, scrumptious bacon and egg pie, a gourmet budget dinner to wow any crowd, the best seafood recipe for a fresh catch, and an Irish favourite to warm the cockles of your heart.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: In this episode, the secret to a heavenly macadamia caramel slice, creating a fresh take on a seafood favourite, and easy home made dinners ready in 10 minutes.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: This beautiful coastal region stretches from the Northern NSW border down to Byron Bay, and Paul is visiting to discover the Finger Lime citrus fruit and a tea plantation. Plus, there's plenty of local fish just waiting to be caught.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul starts his trip through the Peninsula at Portarlington, which is famous for its mussels. On the waterfront, he meets up with the guys from Sea Bounty who invite him out to help harvest shellfish. On his return, Paul takes his catch over to the Ol' Duke restaurant where he shows us some simple ways to cook shellfish.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week Maggie takes us to the heart of Australia for the Alice Springs Desert Festival. Maggie was invited to the Festival to help judge one of its major events, the Wild food competition. Her experiences of the local foods became the inspiration behind this week's cooking, with both Maggie and Simon demonstrating different ways to cook the desert camel before enhancing cake and scones with the exotic coffee flavours of the wattle seed.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: This week we follow Simon as he travels to sunny North Queensland in search of Black Tiger Prawns. Passing through Townsville, he ends up at an ultra-modern prawn farm nestled right in the shadow of Hinchinbrook Island. Maggie doesn't have to travel far for her main ingredient; she uses vine leaves from her own Barossa vines to wrap fish for the barbecue.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain Parts Unknown
programme.desc: In Berlin, an anomaly among German metropolises, Bourdain encounters an extremely accepting society, teeming with unbridled creativity, despite a grim history.(n)

programme.title: Poh & Co. Bitesize
programme.desc: Poh & Co. invites you into the always delicious world of acclaimed cook, artist and lover of life - Poh Ling Yeow.(n)

programme.title: Taste The Nation With Padma Lakshmi
programme.desc: El Paso was once part of Mexico. Its border location defines the region's identity and the complexity of America's political landscape. Padma Lakshmi eats her way through this border city while discovering the origins of one of America's most beloved cuisines. Padma cooks with Emiliano Marentes - the first generation Mexican American owner of the modern Elemi.(n)

programme.title: Tales From River Cottage
programme.desc: Hugh reminisces about the early days at River Cottage, and offers advice to would-be smallholders on how to find their rural escape hatch and get started on the good life.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When Adam, owner of Via Brasil in Las Vegas, is concerned that meat sales aren't being reflected in his register, he calls Charles Stiles for help. When the Mystery Diners go undercover, they discover the manager is doing a lot more than just giving away free steak.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When Stephanie and D-Rock, owners of Cheeseburger Baby in Miami, Florida, notice a discrepancy in their register, they suspect an ex-convict employee is stealing from them. Charles Stiles sends in Mystery Diners Tracy and John to find out who's really responsible.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef

Maggie doesn't have to travel far for her main ingredient; she uses vine leaves from her own Barossa vines to wrap fish for the barbecue.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero
programme.desc: In the early 1960s, more people in Ireland were employed in domestic service (cooks, gardeners, maids) than there were teachers. Donal meets Patricia Quinn Murphy who started her working life as an assistant cook aged 16, in a large house in Wexford and learns about a recent but largely forgotten part of our social history. At Muckross Traditional Farms, Donal is shown how to make soda bread in a bastible and makes Gur Cake, a popular Dublin sweet bread.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt's back in his hometown of Noosa reminiscing about his childhood holidays, which inspire his first recipe - beer battered fish. Courtney prepares a chicken katsu curry, while Matt wraps things up with a classic Italian dessert - tiramisu.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to Calabria - a region with beautiful beaches and rugged mountains. With the help of her son Joe, Lidia creates a baked Cavatapi in a tomato sauce with fresh provolone, as well as chicken Catanzaro - chicken with homemade stuffing. And to end the meal, Lidia and Joe make tasty almond biscotti.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: In this episode, a L.A food truck recipes to make at home, a beach food challenge, a fabulous fish recipe, and a fun way to cook with vegies.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, Miguel's delicious crayfish roll, tasty bbq ribs for a great bunch of volunteers, the great schnitzel challenge, and the latest buzz on where to find the best Aussie honey.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Our journey begins in Japan, the birthplace of instant noodles. When was instant noodles conceived and why do some people consider it the greatest invention Japan has given to the world in the 21st century? To answer these questions and more, our host Kai visits Nissin's CupNoodles Museum in Yokohama and speaks to Mr Yukitaka Tsutsui, the museum's director and close friend to instant noodles inventor Momofuku Ando.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul's journey starts an hours drive east of Queenstown, through rolling hills, to the towns of Cromwell and Alexandra. Tagged the adventure capital of the world, Otago covers the island's south-east corner.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul takes a 50 minute drive from the frenetic pace of Sydney and arrives in the Blue Mountains, where there's no choice but to chill out and relax. This is a world heritage environment, with the magnificent three sisters looking over towns full of historic buildings, a vibrant arts community and unique small businesses.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: In this week's episode Maggie and Simon cook up a few favourites. Simon masters a salty- sweet- sour balance with a vegetarian Phad Thai, while Maggie combines tender squid with capers and leek in a delicious spring salad. Vodka, a favourite beverage of Simon's then features in a jelly, and Maggie makes a creamy barley risotto using a favourite spring vegetable, asparagus.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon show us how to prepare excellent cocktail food for a stress-free party. They share their secrets about what to make ahead of time, and how to use shop-bought bases and toppings.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Food Safari explores a different take on Mediterranean cooking with the rustic delights of Maltese food. Chef Paul Camilleri (Restaurant Sojourn) goes through the essential ingredients, and then cooks his family recipe for the national dish of rabbit stew. Then it's time for the national snack food, pastizzi, and the national sandwich called Hobs Biz Zeit - tomato paste on crusty bread and topped with anchovies, capers and olive oil. Chef Louis Bigeni shows how the Maltese have modified recipes from their neighbours, taking pasta to a different level with a rich meat sauce and baked in pastry.(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry's Absolute Favourites
programme.desc: Mary draws on inspiration from some of her earliest and fondest memories from her childhood holidays and regular trips to the British seaside as she prepares seafood linguine and royal crab and cod fishcakes.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Fruits of the Sea
programme.desc: On a Poldark-grey morning, with the sea crashing against the rocks at Stepper Point, Rick goes fishing with young university student Harry Gilbey. Harry lives only to fish, so has a tendency to neglect his studies. But unusually for a fishing fanatic, he never eats the stuff. Rick is determined to convert him. So when Harry catches a bass, Rick grills it with a vanilla sauce. It smells divine, but will Harry succumb? Rick takes his family on the beach at low tide to put out long lines, something he has done since he was a child.The idea is to bait up lots of hooks and leave them to the incoming tide. With any luck, there should be lots of fish to be gathered up in the morning when the tide recedes. One of Britain's most popular fish is plaice, which Rick cooks in a special sauce, made with red wine, leeks and parma ham.The sound of his son's band, practising noisily in the background, inspires Rick to name the sauce after them - Pablo.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail
programme.desc: Luke takes us to his top 3 traditional Pho Restaurants in Saigon and explains the differences between the styles of Pho Broth found throughout Vietnam. Luke then takes us behind the scenes at Grain, his cooking school in Saigon, where he aims to educate others on Vietnamese cooking. We get an inside look at his cooking studio classes cooking some impressive, yet simple traditional delights with pumpkin flowers, fish, prawns and his favourite Nuoc Cham sauce. Tying back into his morning ritual of Pho, he cooks a quick simple Pho Noodle recipe before ending the day at Xu bar.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After receiving multiple complaints about theft and inappropriate touching during his monthly "Dining in the Dark" event, Hernan, the owner of Catharsis in Miami, Florida, contacts Charles Stiles for help. Mystery Diners Hollie and Billy go undercover and discover that Hernan's employees have created a game where they mess with blindfolded customers for points.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When the namesake owner of George's on Sunset in Miami, Florida, notices a dramatic loss in revenue, he contacts Charles Stiles to investigate. Mystery Diners Rob and Jenny go undercover and discover that George's staff is taking the 'have fun' policy to the next level.(n)

programme.desc: In this episode, a L.A food truck recipes to make at home, a beach food challenge, a fabulous fish recipe, and a fun way to cook with vegies.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, Miguel's delicious crayfish roll, tasty bbq ribs for a great bunch of volunteers, the great schnitzel challenge, and the latest buzz on where to find the best Aussie honey.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Our journey begins in Japan, the birthplace of instant noodles. When was instant noodles conceived and why do some people consider it the greatest invention Japan has given to the world in the 21st century? To answer these questions and more, our host Kai visits Nissin's CupNoodles Museum in Yokohama and speaks to Mr Yukitaka Tsutsui, the museum's director and close friend to instant noodles inventor Momofuku Ando.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul's journey starts an hours drive east of Queenstown, through rolling hills, to the towns of Cromwell and Alexandra. Tagged the adventure capital of the world, Otago covers the island's south-east corner.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Paul takes a 50 minute drive from the frenetic pace of Sydney and arrives in the Blue Mountains, where there's no choice but to chill out and relax. This is a world heritage environment, with the magnificent three sisters looking over towns full of historic buildings, a vibrant arts community and unique small businesses.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Food Safari
programme.desc: Food Safari explores a different take on Mediterranean cooking with the rustic delights of Maltese food. Chef Paul Camilleri (Restaurant Sojourn) goes through the essential ingredients, and then cooks his family recipe for the national dish of rabbit stew. Then it's time for the national snack food, pastizzi, and the national sandwich called Hobs Biz Zeit - tomato paste on crusty bread and topped with anchovies, capers and olive oil. Chef Louis Bigeni shows how the Maltese have modified recipes from their neighbours, taking pasta to a different level with a rich meat sauce and baked in pastry.(n)

programme.title: Mary Berry's Absolute Favourites
programme.desc: Mary draws on inspiration from some of her earliest and fondest memories from her childhood holidays and regular trips to the British seaside as she prepares seafood linguine and royal crab and cod fishcakes.(n)

programme.title: Rick Stein's Fruits of the Sea
programme.desc: On a Poldark-grey morning, with the sea crashing against the rocks at Stepper Point, Rick goes fishing with young university student Harry Gilbey. Harry lives only to fish, so has a tendency to neglect his studies. But unusually for a fishing fanatic, he never eats the stuff. Rick is determined to convert him. So when Harry catches a bass, Rick grills it with a vanilla sauce. It smells divine, but will Harry succumb? Rick takes his family on the beach at low tide to put out long lines, something he has done since he was a child.The idea is to bait up lots of hooks and leave them to the incoming tide. With any luck, there should be lots of fish to be gathered up in the morning when the tide recedes. One of Britain's most popular fish is plaice, which Rick cooks in a special sauce, made with red wine, leeks and parma ham.The sound of his son's band, practising noisily in the background, inspires Rick to name the sauce after them - Pablo.(n)

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Food Trail
programme.desc: Luke takes us to his top 3 traditional Pho Restaurants in Saigon and explains the differences between the styles of Pho Broth found throughout Vietnam. Luke then takes us behind the scenes at Grain, his cooking school in Saigon, where he aims to educate others on Vietnamese cooking. We get an inside look at his cooking studio classes cooking some impressive, yet simple traditional delights with pumpkin flowers, fish, prawns and his favourite Nuoc Cham sauce. Tying back into his morning ritual of Pho, he cooks a quick simple Pho Noodle recipe before ending the day at Xu bar.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After receiving multiple complaints about theft and inappropriate touching during his monthly "Dining in the Dark" event, Hernan, the owner of Catharsis in Miami, Florida, contacts Charles Stiles for help. Mystery Diners Hollie and Billy go undercover and discover that Hernan's employees have created a game where they mess with blindfolded customers for points.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: When the namesake owner of George's on Sunset in Miami, Florida, notices a dramatic loss in revenue, he contacts Charles Stiles to investigate. Mystery Diners Rob and Jenny go undercover and discover that George's staff is taking the 'have fun' policy to the next level.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: In this week's episode Maggie and Simon cook up a few favourites. Simon masters a salty- sweet- sour balance with a vegetarian Phad Thai, while Maggie combines tender squid with capers and leek in a delicious spring salad. Vodka, a favourite beverage of Simon's then features in a jelly, and Maggie makes a creamy barley risotto using a favourite spring vegetable, asparagus.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon show us how to prepare excellent cocktail food for a stress-free party. They share their secrets about what to make ahead of time, and how to use shop-bought bases and toppings.(n)

programme.title: Donal's Kitchen Hero Feast
programme.desc: Donal visits three of Galway's finest artisan food producers - Connemara Salmon Smokehouse, Connemara Hill Lamb, and Cuinneog Buttermilk. He then prepares the first feast at the spectacularly located Lisdonagh House in Headford, Co Galway.(n)

programme.title: The Cook's Pantry With Matt Sinclair
programme.desc: Matt is on location on the bank of the Noosa River, cooking a delicious prawn salad, while Michael cooks the perfect steak sandwich. Courtney cooks the perfect roast mushroom and couscous salad.(n)

programme.title: Lidia's Italy
programme.desc: Lidia travels to the beautiful region of Sardegna where she makes two wonderful eggplant dishes, and a delicious prune cake for dessert. First Lidia creates a baked eggplant with onions, tomatoes and pecorino cheese. For the second dish, Lidia is joined by her son Joe, to help her create a baked eggplant with onions, capers, and olives. Joe also gives some suggestions of great Sardinian wine to go along with these magnificent dishes. And for dessert Lidia makes a sponge cake with prunes and red wine.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Feasts
programme.desc: Today, farm fresh produce with real bite, Miguel puts his churros up against some tasty donuts, a seaside classic you can make at home, and an easy Mother's day treat that kids can manage - meatloaf with love.(n)

programme.title: Miguel's Tropical Kitchen
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of tropical North Queensland, Miguel Maestre, chef and one of the stars from Boys Weekend charms his way through the hot northern tropics cooking with many of the region's exotic ingredients in breathtaking locations. He kicks things off with the freshest North Queensland seafood in a classic Sanish Fideua, followed by a cheeky Pineapple Mojito and a breathtaking coconut breakfast on the beach at sunrise.(n)

programme.title: Instant Noodles Diary
programme.desc: Aroy Mak Mak! The Thais mean business when it comes to their instant noodles. On average, they spend 30% of their income on these packets of instant gratification. Chef McDang, Thailand's leading food expert and writer, invites Kai into his home and shares how instant noodles came to the land of a thousand smiles.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: A visit to the west coast of Australia throws up limitless possiblilities - from the historic port of Fremantle to the ulitmate getaway, Margaret River, Paul enjoys the world class wine and fabulous fresh produce of the Western Coast.(n)

programme.title: Mercurio's Menu
programme.desc: Buffalo, bush tucker, barramundi, bush limes and lemons. It's all on the menu! Paul travels to the top end where it's always warm and that brings the locals and tourists out in force to immerse themselves in the nightlife, local markets and restaurants.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Maggie and Simon revisit a few of their favourite kitchen moments from the year. They look back on the eggs, pasta, and mouth-watering desserts on the menu.(n)

programme.title: The Cook and the Chef
programme.desc: Simon and Maggie stroll back into the kitchen for a new season to dish up a refreshing summer feast. Maggie uses delicious second flush raspberries to adorn a fail proof sponge while Simon works magic with a raspberry, lamb and pea combination. Simon then treats us to a saucy fish curry using fresh territory barramundi, while Maggie adds layers of sweet tang to her barra with a lemon confit.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine With Me Uk Couples
programme.desc: Join couples from across the United Kingdom as they attempt to host a perfect dinner party and compete for one thousand pounds in cash.(n)

programme.title: Island Feast With Peter Kuruvita
programme.desc: Chef Peter Kuruvita finds an intriguing mix of excitement and relaxation on the island of Tanna in Vanuatu. This volcanic island is home to a steadfastly preserved traditional way of life and its chiefs grant Peter approval to cook atop the slopes of its active volcano, Mt Yasur. Emerging unscathed with a batch of fire-roasted seafood cakes, Peter helps prepare a traditional Melanesian feast and discovers the calming effects of the famous kava root.(n)

programme.title: French Food Safari
programme.desc: This series is a celebration of exquisite French cuisine in all its delicious complexity. Presented by Maeve O'Meara, the series follows renowned Sydney chef Guillaume Brahimi on a personal journey back to France, the country of his birth. Together, they visit many of France's top kitchens and track down the finest food and wine the country has to offer.(n)

programme.title: Hemsley + Hemsley: Healthy & Delicious
programme.sub-title: Hemsely & Hemsley: Healthy And Delicious Series 1 Ep 2
programme.desc: Jasmine and Melissa visit The Crystal Palace Market to collect ingredients for a feast made up of huevos rancheros and a chocolate molten pot with figs and mango cashew cream.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Cosmopolitan Cook
programme.desc: Rachel journeys to the Princes' Islands of Istanbul, a chain of small islands worlds away from the hustle and bustle of the city. An inspiring locale bursting with local culture, the islands are home to charming cafes and meandering streets. Back in London Rachel whips up her take on a traditional mezze, and for a sweet touch she bakes a beautiful Pistachio Yogurt Cake with Pomegranate marbling.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
programme.desc: After noticing a recent unusually low haul in crab claws, Luis, owner of Garcia's Seafood Grille and Fish Market in Miami, Florida, contacts Charles Stiles for help. Mystery Diners Harry and Carlos go undercover and discover where the seafood is going missing.(n)

programme.title: Mystery Diners
